title: Les Anges de la Route
abstract: Note: Adapted from 'Elle a tort Jacinthe de se pencher comme ca' by Odette Joyeux.
description: Episode of Series “Le Tresor des Hollandais”. Olympe and the last members of the Corps de Ballet are finally on their way to the airport. On the roof of their car, they are carrying a huge accessories basket containing Coppelia and the treasure. Not far behind, Stephane and Lulu are making sure that the basket duly goes through customs. Stephane who was due to take his cabaret show to Las Vegas is informed by Morales that he must follow the ballet to Canada and supervise the return of the real jewels to the Canadian contact. Meanwhile, the injured nightwatchman is making interesting revelations to Inspector Boudot.  Credits: Director, Philippe Agostini; writer, Odette Joyeux; photography, Christian Petard; music, Georges Auric; choreography, Michel Descombey; costumes, Pierre Balmain. Cast: Claude Bessy, Claude Ariel, Catherine Bouchy, Pierre Didier, Felix Marten, Jacques Fabbri, Robert Manuel.
related_objects: Series; S002034; Le Tresor des Hollandais; Active; 1969
